home.title: NV & NE ltd
home.subtitle: Your personal space to upload, manage, and analyze media with the power of AI.
home.description: Securely store your media, generate shareable links, and unlock insights from your content.

auth.greeting: Sign in or create an account to continue.
auth.errorUserExists: User with this email already exists.

verification.title: Verify your email
verification.description: A verification code has been sent to {email}. Please enter the code below to complete your registration.
verification.errorInvalidCode: Invalid verification code. Please try again.
verification.resendCooldown: You can resend the code in {seconds} seconds.
verification.resendSuccess: A new code has been sent.

main.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this media? This action cannot be undone.
main.creator: Made by Eric tech

uploader.title: Drag & Drop your media here
uploader.subtitle: or click to browse your files
uploader.errorInvalidFile: Please upload a valid video, audio, or image file.

gallery.title: Your Media Library
gallery.name: Name
gallery.emptyDescription: Click the button below to get started and add your first media file.
gallery.noResultsDescription: Your search and filter criteria did not match any files.
gallery.confirmDeleteSelected: Are you sure you want to delete the selected {count} items? This action cannot be undone.

player.errorDescription: The file may be corrupted or missing.

share.title: Share Media
share.linkDescription: Anyone with this link can view the media in this browser session.
share.embedDescription: Copy and paste this code to embed the media on your website.
share.note: Note: This link is temporary and only works on this device during your current session. For permanent hosting, upload the media to a dedicated service.

aiPanel.title: Ask About Media
aiPanel.error: Sorry, I couldn't get an answer. {error}
aiPanel.notSupportedDescription: Sorry, AI analysis for audio files is not yet supported.

settings.title: Settings
settings.darkModeDesc: Reduce glare and improve night viewing.
settings.loopMediaDesc: Automatically replay videos/audio when they end.
settings.cinemaModeDesc: Creates an immersive background glow for videos.
settings.performanceModeDesc: Reduces effects and quality to improve speed.
settings.defaultPlaybackSpeedDesc: Set the default speed for videos and audio.
settings.dataManagementDesc: Permanently delete all uploaded media from your browser's storage. This cannot be undone.
settings.confirmClearAll: Are you sure you want to delete ALL your media? This action is permanent and cannot be undone.

help.title: About NV & NE ltd
help.summaryText: This application is a sophisticated, modern web application that functions as a secure, personal video management system running entirely in your browser. It's a {creator} development Software where users can sign up, log in, manage a private library of their videos, and use a powerful AI to analyze and answer questions about video content.
help.featureAuth: Secure User Authentication: Includes a full sign-up, login, and email verification flow with "Remember me" and logout functionality.
help.featureMediaManagement: Robust Video Management: Uses your browser's IndexedDB for fast, private, and offline-functional video storage. A user-friendly drag & drop uploader makes adding videos simple.
help.featurePlayer: Advanced Video Player: Features a custom player and a standout Cinema Mode that creates an immersive, blurred background glow from the video's colors.
help.featureAI: AI-Powered Video Analysis: The app's most powerful feature. You can ask the AI for a summary of the video or ask specific questions about its content. The app securely sends video data to an advanced AI model for analysis.
help.featureShare: Easy Sharing Options: Instantly generate a shareable link or an HTML <iframe> embed code for any video. Note that these are temporary and session-based.
help.featureWatermark: Dynamic Video Watermark: A subtle, moving watermark with your username can be displayed on your videos for personalization. This can be toggled in the settings.
help.featureSettings: Customizable User Settings: Personalize your experience by toggling Dark Mode, video looping, Cinema Mode, and the video watermark.
help.stackStorage: Local Storage: IndexedDB (for video files) and LocalStorage (for user data/settings)
help.createdByText: This application was personally created by {creator}.
help.supportText1: This application and all its features are controlled and managed by {creator}.
help.supportText2: For any support inquiries, issues, or questions, please contact us at our controlling email address: {email}.
help.troubleshootingIntro: If you encounter any issues, please try the following steps first:
help.troubleUpload: Video Upload Failed: Ensure you are using a standard video format (like MP4 or WebM) and that your browser has sufficient storage space.
help.troubleAI: AI Analysis Error: Check your internet connection. An API key for the AI service must be correctly configured in the application's environment for this feature to work.
help.troubleGeneral: General Problems: Try refreshing the page or clearing your browser's cache for this site.
